pullrequest.title: Raise warning if running Segway in identify mode with non-zero verbosity.

content.raw:
This is a very minor point, but it's nicer for each condition to be on it's own line. This is done simply by putting the entire condition in brackets and line breaking after the "and". Usually it's good practice for readability and being able to step through conditionals with a debugger.

@hoffman might think this is irrelevant.
